issue.title: [C++] Fully deprecate CompareOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that GLib doesn't have a dependency on CompareOptions, we can fully deprecate/remove it and the associated enum.
